subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Sources Say All Duke Rape Charges To Be Dropped
body:
A person close to the Duke lacrosse sexual assault case tells the AP state 
prosecutors will drop all remaining charges against the three players.







Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details.
